T02TD2142E:215b-1: ha ya gr'i ba s'a ngha na /
T02TD2142E:215b-4: padma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2142E:215b-6: bde ba'i stan la gnas pa dang //
T02TD2142E:215b-7: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
T02TD2142E:215b-8: zla kham smug nag dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2142E:215b-9: pam las chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad //
T02TD2142E:215b-10: mam las nyi ma'i gdan stengs su //
T02TD2142E:215b-11: hr'i: dmar rgyu yi sa bon las //
T02TD2142E:215b-12: ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar //
T02TD2142E:215b-13: gdug pa can rnams ma lus bsreg / me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du ;
T02TD2142E:215b-14: / hr'i: las bskyed pa'i rta mchog ni //
T02TD2142E:215b-15: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar //
T02TD2142E:215b-16: steng zhal rta mgo ljang gu ni //
T02TD2142E:215b-17: drag po rta skad rab tu bzhad //
T02TD2142E:215b-18: khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud //
T02TD2142E:215b-19: phyag g-yas thod dbyug dkar po bsnams //
T02TD2142E:215b-20: bgegs dang 'byung po ma lus s'joms //
T02TD2142E:215b-21: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub me ltar 'bar //
T02TD2142E:215b-22: gnod byed ma lus sreg par byed //
T02TD2142E:215b-23: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang bdud bzhi mnan //
T02TD2142E:215b-24: spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer bsdus //
T02TD2142E:215b-26: skra ser dbu rgyan thod skam can //
T02TD2142E:215b-27: khrag 'dzag brgya phyed do shal byas //
T02TD2142E:215b-28: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
T02TD2142E:216a-3: gang gis mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku //
T02TD2142E:216a-4: thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2142E:216a-5: hr'i: yig sngags kyis bskor ba las //
T02TD2142E:216a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2142E:216a-8: de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa ni //
T02TD2142E:216a-9: aom badzra kro dha ha ya gr'i ba hu lu hu lu h'um phat //
T02TD2142E:216a-11: de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni //
T02TD2142E:216a-12: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
T02TD2142E:216a-13: a'a las thod pa yangs pa ru //
T02TD2142E:216a-14: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yis gang //
T02TD2142E:216a-15: ye shes bdud rtsi gnyis su med //
T02TD2142E:216a-17: ai dam ba lam aa mri ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi //
T02TD2142E:216a-18: rtsa sngags btags la lan gsum gyis /
T02TD2142E:216a-19: phul nas bstod dang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2142E:216a-20: hr'i: las bskyed pa'i rta mchog sku //
T02TD2142E:216a-21: nyi ma'i 'od mtshungs nyon mongs bsreg / bdud bzhi ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2142E:216a-22: dpa' bo rta mgrin phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2142E:216a-23: slob ma'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2142E:216a-24: gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD2142E:216a-26: sku gsung thugs rnams bstim pa'o //
T02TD2142E:216a-27: lha dang sngags kyi rjes gnang bya //
T02TD2142E:216a-28: slob mas phyag 'tshal yon dbul lo //
T02TD2142E:216a-29: dpa' bo rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD2142E:216a-30: 'od dpag med kyis lung bstan pa'i //
T02TD2142E:216a-31: mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams //
T02TD2142E:216a-32: dge bas rta mchog sku thob shog //
T02TD2142E:216a-33: / pandi ta zla ba bzang po dang glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te dge'o//
